text.title: Zayn Malik leaves pop band One Direction after five years
text.head: Zayn Malik leaves pop band One Direction after five years
Sources

list.item: Todd Leopold. "Zayn Malik leaving One Direction" — CNN , March 26, 2015
Alex Bell. "Zayn Malik leaves One Direction: Hundreds ask for compassionate leave after star quits band" — Manchester Evening News , March 26, 2015
Del Crooks. "Zayn Malik is leaving One Direction but group continues as four-piece" — BBC Newsbeat , March 25, 2015
Camilla Turner. "Zayn Malik leaves One Direction - as it happened, March 25, 2015" — The Daily Telegraph , March 25, 2015
